sn26.1:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. "Yo kho, bhikkhave, cakkhussa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṁ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo. Yo sotassa uppādo ṭhiti … pe … yo ghānassa uppādo ṭhiti … yo jivhāya uppādo ṭhiti … yo kāyassa uppādo ṭhiti … yo manassa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṁ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
